Pre-Game Insights: Chris Hughton has made three changes to his starting line up for the FIFA World Cup qualifier against Comoros.
Denis Odoi, Kasim Nuhu Adams and captain Andre Ayew have been named in place of injured Daniel Amartey, Alidu Seidu and Mohammed Kudus.
Gideon Mensah, Denis Odoi, Nicholas Opoku and Kasim Nuhu make the back four with Richard Ofori keeping his place in goal.
Abdul Samed Salis and Baba Iddrisu will play in the heart of pitch while Andre Ayew operates behind the front three of Antoine Semenyo, Jordan Ayew and Inaki Williams.
The FIFA World Cup qualifier is scheduled for 19:00 CT (4pm Gh Time) kick off at Omnisports stadium in Moroni on Tuesday, November 21, 2023.
